body: yaoi one piece dj for the winnnnn! shut the fuck up and let us enjoy this yaoi!
Whats with the comments… its a dj, if you dont like it, ignore it. Not that hard yknow, takes less work to ignore than to click on it and comment :/

It really doesn't work since pretty much every male in One Piece is straight except for Bentham.  There are some who probably border along the lines, but nope. I have to give this doujin credit since the art is pretty good, but gay Luffy feels so warped, lol.
reply to jdogzero: well too bad, this is real good shit right here👌
GAY DOESNT FIT WITH ONE PIECE STOP MAKING THEM
